transcript.title: Visit to Australia by the King and Queen of Sweden
transcript.content:
19 OCTOBER 1983.

His Majesty King Carl XVI Gustaf and Her MajestyÂ Silvia of Sweden are to make a State Visit to Australia during late March and early April 1982 at the invitation of the Governor-General.

His Majesty has visited Australia previously when, as Crown Prince, he was a cadet on the Swedish naval training ship Alzsnabben which visited Australia in early 1967.

The State Visit will be the first by a Swedish monarch to Australia.

The detailed arrangements for the visit are being planned in consultation with the authorities in the States and will be announced in due course.
